verses.kjv: Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful.
verses.ct: How happy is the person who doesn't follow the advice of the wicked, doesn't hang around with sinners, or join in with those who mock others.

verses.kjv: But his delight is in the law of the LORD; and in his law doth he meditate day and night.
verses.ct: Instead, they find joy in the law of the LORD, thinking deeply about it day and night.

verses.kjv: And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that bringeth forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.
verses.ct: They are like a tree growing beside streams of water, producing fruit at just the right time, with leaves that never dry up. Everything they do succeeds.

verses.kjv: The ungodly are not so: but are like the chaff which the wind driveth away.
verses.ct: The wicked are nothing like this â€” they are like husks of grain that the wind blows away.

verses.kjv: Therefore the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment, nor sinners in the congregation of the righteous.
verses.ct: That is why the wicked will not survive the judgment, and sinners will have no place among the righteous.

verses.kjv: For the LORD knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.
verses.ct: The LORD watches over the path of the righteous, but the path of the wicked leads to destruction.
